description:
Revert 120928 - Add a switch to invert web contents (non-accel only).

The switch will just be used during development of this feature.
The idea is for this to be turned automatically for Windows users
who enable an inverted (white-on-black) color scheme - see bug
for detail.

This first patch only handles the non-accelerated graphics path;
a subsequent change will handle the accelerated path.

BUG=112944
TEST=manually test with --invert-web-contents switch


Review URL: http://codereview.chromium.org/9353012

TBR=dmazzoni@chromium.org
Committed: https://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=120941

messages.text:
Greetings,

Unfortunately, this change seems to use a function 'SkTableColorFilter::CreateARGB' not exported by Skia and it probably causes build breaks for debug builers, which uses component builds: 
* Win Builder 2010 (dbg) <http://chromegw.corp.google.com/i/chromium/builders/Win%20Builder%202010%20%28dbg%29/builds/15996/steps/compile/logs/stdio>;
* Win Builder (dbg) <http://chromegw.corp.google.com/i/chromium/builders/Win%20Builder%20%28dbg%29/builds/24870/steps/compile/logs/stdio>, and;
* Win Aura <http://chromegw.corp.google.com/i/chromium/builders/Win%20Aura/builds/5436/steps/compile/logs/stdio>.

Regards,

Hironori Bono

subject: Revert 120928 - Add a switch to invert web contents (non-accel only).
